Manufacturing Quality Control Challenges

⚙️

High-Mix, Low-Volume Complexity

Traditional inspection systems struggle with diverse product lines and small batch sizes, requiring extensive setup and programming.

⏱️

Time-Consuming Setup

Conventional systems require weeks or months to configure, making them impractical for agile manufacturing environments.

💰

High Implementation Costs

Expensive hardware and specialized expertise create barriers to entry for many manufacturers seeking quality automation.

Meet AVIS: Your Portable Quality Control Solution

AVIS revolutionizes manufacturing inspection with portable computer vision technology that adapts to your production needs, not the other way around.

  • Portable and flexible deployment
  • 10mm inspection accuracy
  • 24-hour setup and configuration
  • iPhone compatibility for easy operation
  • AI-powered defect detection
  • Real-time quality feedback
